Title: Day 6: 2:00 P.M. - 3:00 P.M.
Plot: Marilyn gives Jack a lead that will help him find Gredenko, but they hit a wall as Phillip takes steps to cover his tracks. As Lennox learns more about Reed's plan, the Vice-President pushes Wayne to reconsider his dialogue with Assad.
GuestStars: Jolene Kim,  Brian Silverman,  Maury Sterling,  Natalija Nogulich,  Adrian Neil,  James Cromwell
